exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable x.
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

original: intros P x y H. unfold locally_2d in *. apply locally_singleton. intros u v. apply locally_singleton. exists (mkposreal (Rabs (u - x) / 2) (Rabs_pos (u - x) / 2)). intros q H1 H2. apply H.
